original_text: Some of those who were with us went to the tomb and found it just as the women had said, but him they did not see.”
korean_text: 또 우리와 함께 한 자 중에 두어 사람이 무덤에 가 과연 여자들이 말한 바와 같음을 보았으나 예수는 보지 못하였느니라 하거늘

sentences.original_text: Some of those who were with us
sentences.korean_translation: 우리와 함께 있던 사람 중 몇이

sentences.original_text: just as the women had said
but him they did not see
